unnormalised: **Adaptive Learning Gaining Traction in Indian Education Sector**
normalised: **Adaptive Learning Gaining Traction in Indian Education Sector**

unnormalised: New Delhi – October 26, 2023 – Adaptive learning platforms are rapidly transforming the Indian education landscape, offering personalized learning experiences tailored to individual student needs. These AI-powered systems analyze student performance in real-time and adjust the difficulty of content accordingly, ensuring optimal learning outcomes.
normalised: New Delhi – October twenty six, two thousand and twenty three – Adaptive learning platforms are rapidly transforming the Indian education landscape, offering personalized learning experiences tailored to individual student needs. These A I-powered systems analyze student performance in real-time and adjust the difficulty of content accordingly, ensuring optimal learning outcomes.

unnormalised: IIT-Bombay is piloting a program using adaptive learning modules for its undergraduate engineering courses, showing promising results in student engagement and comprehension. Similarly, several private schools in Mumbai are integrating these tools to address learning gaps exacerbated by the pandemic.

unnormalised: "Like Raju Rastogi in 3 Idiots, every student learns at a different pace," says Dr. Sharma, an education technology expert. "Adaptive learning acknowledges this diversity and provides a customized learning journey for each individual." Several ed-tech companies are now offering affordable solutions, bridging the digital divide and making quality education accessible to students in even remote areas. Initial data indicates an average improvement of 15% in test scores among students using adaptive learning platforms regularly. This transformative technology has the potential to revolutionize education across Bharat.
